channel.title: Online money making..?
channel.description:
Alright, so i've never had money online through paypal, made money etc.
I've heard what you can do is online surveys for money but im not sure, what im asking is what is a few easy ways to make money online, going to use it to pay for rs mems etc. Also, i've got paypal, do i HAVE to have a creditcard, debit card or a prepaid card etc linked to it or can it work without it?
Thanks for any help in advance.

item.title: Online money making..?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Motokid126, post:23, topic:354059”][quote]Also, you may not want to do this, but you could bot accounts and then sell them to a RS Acc site.
[/quote]

Right, but bots are like 15-20$ I’d like to do that, but i need a few bots before i can make an acc =p. That would be the easiest thing to do.

@Tribey-I don’t really know anything about photoshop or any of that stuff =p.[/quote]RSBot (powerbot) does work.

Read full topic

item.title: Online money making..?
item.dc:creator: @boycie-tribey Tribey
item.description:
@boycie-tribey wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:21, topic:354059”][quote author=Tribey link=topic=450352.msg3304445#msg3304445 date=1281559119]
I highly suggest learning coding languages, HTML to be precise. The alternative to that is web design, learn how to design websites with photoshop. I earn around £50 a month from web designing & coding. One web design takes you around 1-2 hours maximum, and an average one goes for £10-20 ($30-40)

Good luck mate.
[/quote]You can’t design webpages in photoshop, you can design graphics in it. Something similar would be a dreamweaver + photoshop combo, but if you’re selling your designs you’d need to have a licensed copy of both. Unless you mean making the entire page an image, and then using an imagemap for links etc (which is weird) you would still need to know HTML.[/quote]

Yes, you can design webpages in Photoshop, you sell the PSD file and then it’s coded by another person. That’s what I do, anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Online money making..?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Tribey, post:18, topic:354059”]I highly suggest learning coding languages, HTML to be precise. The alternative to that is web design, learn how to design websites with photoshop. I earn around £50 a month from web designing & coding. One web design takes you around 1-2 hours maximum, and an average one goes for £10-20 ($30-40)

Good luck mate.[/quote]You can’t design webpages in photoshop, you can design graphics in it. Something similar would be a dreamweaver + photoshop combo, but if you’re selling your designs you’d need to have a licensed copy of both. Unless you mean making the entire page an image, and then using an imagemap for links etc (which is weird) you would still need to know HTML.

[quote="`Alec, post:18, topic:354061"]If you tell the truth, and you aren’t 12, than you could just get a job and buy a prepaid card.
Really, you make a lot of cash doing seemingly pointless jobs, have fun.

BTW, thanks Kihomura for deleting the spam posted by that those other two members and myself.[/quote]He could be 13, 14, or 15 and unable to get a job.

[quote=“Motokid126, post:20, topic:354059”]Yeah i was thinking buy a prepaid card, add it to paypal and when im bored or something do random crap on the internet and gain a bit of extra cash to pay for rs mems and what not. I live in a small town and i cant’ get a job lol, im 15 anyways so yeah. But like David said, i guess im down to doing surveys, never done those i could try it[/quote]Also, you may not want to do this, but you could bot accounts and then sell them to a RS Acc site.

Read full topic

item.title: Online money making..?
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

[quote="`Aaron, post:2, topic:354059"][quote author=Motokid126 link=topic=450352.msg3303578#msg3303578 date=1281488366]

there is this amazing site,

http://www.google.com/

Thanks fag, i was asking for advice, not google idiot.

And Thanks Rip4d ill look at adsense, does anyone know about the paypal deal? Do i have to have a card linked to it? I’ve been trying to figure out if i need to or not
[/quote]

Sorry for the lack of help in your topic.

First, you don’t need to have anything directly connected to paypal such as a bank card or credit card. Paypal uses funds that are for paypal accounts ONLY, which you can withdraw through your own bank if you wanted to.

Example, i send you 0.01 through paypal, you would have a balance of 0.01 in your paypal account.

Adsense doesn’t really make you any money unless you have a website like Moparscape, Moparisthebest, etc.

AdSense is an ad serving application run by Google. Website owners can enroll in this program to enable text, image, and video advertisements on their websites. These advertisements are administered by Google and generate revenue on either a per-click or per-impression basis[/quote]

Alright i see, thank you! I’ve heard some people do online surveys etc to gain little money online, i might try that since i’m no tto familiar with AdSense or anything else really.

Read full topic

item.title: Online money making..?
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

[quote=“Motokid126, post:4, topic:354061”][quote author=`Alec link=topic=450352.msg3303567#msg3303567 date=1281487825]
there is this amazing site,

http://www.google.com/
[/quote]

Thanks fag, i was asking for advice, not google idiot.

And Thanks Rip4d ill look at adsense, does anyone know about the paypal deal? Do i have to have a card linked to it? I’ve been trying to figure out if i need to or not[/quote]

Sorry for the lack of help in your topic.

First, you don’t need to have anything directly connected to paypal such as a bank card or credit card. Paypal uses funds that are for paypal accounts ONLY, which you can withdraw through your own bank if you wanted to.

Example, i send you 0.01 through paypal, you would have a balance of 0.01 in your paypal account.

Adsense doesn’t really make you any money unless you have a website like Moparscape, Moparisthebest, etc.

AdSense is an ad serving application run by Google. Website owners can enroll in this program to enable text, image, and video advertisements on their websites. These advertisements are administered by Google and generate revenue on either a per-click or per-impression basis

Read full topic
